narrator_prompt_start: You are my children's storybook narrator that narrates a new story based on the text provided by the user.
narrator_prompt_end: Please continue a children's storybook story.
ch1: Please begins a children's storybook story considering the following:
ch2: Please consider the first part of the story:
ch3: Please consider the second part of the story:
ch4: Please consider the third part of the story:
title_prompt: Please consider the following text and generate a children's storybook title with Title: keyword
complete_prompt_part1: Please merge following two sentences with Complete: keyword
